From Apple's Pages to Markdown

10 Feb 2017

I have a lot of documents authored with Apple’s Pages. I wanted to convert these to markdown texts with the images (mostly screen grabs). The Pages file format is a proprietary format, and so we are dependent on the limited export features that the program itself provides. So how can we do this?

Read more...

Validation

05 Feb 2017

Everything needs to be perfect for it to work in the digital domain. Or does it? Can our screens forgive our little markup errors?

Vertical Spacing for text: pBook and eBook

04 Feb 2017

When we choose a value for leading in InDesign, we are actually defining the distance between the baselines. The more traditional definition of leading is the space between the baseline and top of character container; the term coming from the little slabs of lead put between the type.

Read more...

HTML, XHTML, HTML5 or XHTML5

03 Feb 2017

Goodness me there seem to be so many flavours of HTML. What does this all mean for eBook production and why should we care?
